scripts.app: concurrently -k -n 'database,client,server' -c '#7f00ff,#ff0000,#ff8c00' 'npm run database' 'npm run client' 'npm run server'
scripts.client: wait-on tcp:5500 && npm --prefix client run dev
scripts.server: wait-on tcp:5432 && npm --prefix server run start:dev
scripts.bootstrap: npm i && npm --prefix client i && npm --prefix server i
